page.title: 06The W.I. Market
page.content: At the{W.I. Market}they get about 150 people a day in spring. The products in the stalls come from the people of the area. The money from the stalls goes to the people who bring the products in. There are two hundred members of the market. It first started in 1974. They sell{butter, eggs, {cream, cakes, pasties, jam, marmalade, {peanut butter, flowers, clothes, {clocks, fruit, pots, and salad. { }The people like working at the W.I. Market which has been going on for 11 years. It is only open on {Wednesdays.}It opens at 10.45 till 12 noon. The people mostly come because of the fruit and vegetables. It is quite busy there. The food is cheap. On each store they get about twenty of thirty people on a average day for them.
